text: Robert "Bob" James Boyle II (born May 18, 1971) is an American animator whose known for Wow! Wow! Wubbzy!. == Works == * The Fairly OddParents * Wow! Wow! Wubbzy! * Yin Yang Yo! * The Powerpuff Girls (2016 revival) * Poochini (character designer) == Related works == * Nutri Ventures: The Series - Developer, English dub (2013-2021) ==Other websites== * Category:American animators Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:1971 births Category:The Powerpuff Girls Category:Cartoon Network Category:American television writers Category:Living people
title: Bob Boyle
